faq.question: Is this AI photo filter tool free?
faq.answer: Yes! This AI filter is completely free and requires no login.

faq.question: What styles can I apply to my photo?
faq.answer: You can apply styles like Ghibli, anime, cartoon, pixel art, realistic, and more.

faq.question: Do I need to install anything?
faq.answer: No, the tool works directly in your browser.

faq.question: Can I upload my own photo?
faq.answer: Yes. You can upload your own image and apply any filter style you choose.

faq.question: Where is the result saved?
faq.answer: The generated photo will be displayed and downloadable instantly.

faq.question: Does it work on mobile?
faq.answer: Yes, the AI photo filter tool works on both desktop and mobile devices.
